### Inputs

The DatabaseReplica resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:





<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"

</dd>

            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>The name for the database replica.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Region</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>DigitalOcean region where the replica will reside.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>

</dd>

            title="">

</dd>

</dd>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Database replica's hostname.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>password</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Password for the replica's default user.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>port</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Network port that the database replica is listening on.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>private_<wbr>host</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Same as `host`, but only accessible from resources within the account and in the same region.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>private_<wbr>uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Same as `uri`, but only accessible from resources within the account and in the same region.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The full URI for connecting to the database replica.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>user</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Username for the replica's default user.
</dd>

</dl>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Cluster<wbr>Id</span>

    </dt>
    <dd>The ID of the original source database cluster.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Database</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Name of the replica's default database.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Host</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Database replica's hostname.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The name for the database replica.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Password</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Password for the replica's default user.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Port</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>Network port that the database replica is listening on.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Private<wbr>Host</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Same as `host`, but only accessible from resources within the account and in the same region.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Private<wbr>Uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>

</dd>

        <span>Region</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>DigitalOcean region where the replica will reside.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>

</dd>

            title="Optional">

    </dt>

        <span>port</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Network port that the database replica is listening on.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>private_<wbr>host</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Same as `host`, but only accessible from resources within the account and in the same region.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>private_<wbr>uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Same as `uri`, but only accessible from resources within the account and in the same region.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>region</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>DigitalOcean region where the replica will reside.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Database Droplet size associated with the replica (ex. `db-s-1vcpu-1gb`).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>tags</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">List[str]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The full URI for connecting to the database replica.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>user</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Username for the replica's default user.
</dd>

</dl>
